title: 32. How to Win on Instagram + Esties Have Acne Too With Alyssa K.
description:
Hi Roomies, in this episode I'm chatting with Alysssa Kotter, Master Esthetician, podcaster, Instagram influencer + educator. I really enjoyed talking with Alyssa since I've already learned so much since following her this past year. In this episode we talk:

- Why you don’t need to come out of esthetician school w perf skin

- Choosing a product line

- How to grow your Instagram + why it's important

- Creating a unique, shareable content or product 

- Alyssa's acne tips

- Why there's room for everyone to win in esthetics 

Alyssa's IG

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

You can shop my Glymed store here

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa
